Package metaface.embodiment

Class Summary
DrawingArea DrawingArea is a double buffered panel that captures paint calls and executes the MPEG-4Face.drawFace method
GirlMPEG4Face This class constructs a female MPEG-4 two-dimensional face for a MetaFace application.
IdleBehaviour This class defines the idle behaviour to be used by a MetaFace application.
MPEG4ExpressionCoordinates ExpressionCoordinates is a utility class that will quickly transform a 3D array of facial coordinates according to the current expression.
MPEG4Face Abstract class that provides interface for classes to construct MPEG-4 faces
SpeechBubble This class is used to render speech text within a cartoon speech bubble.
SpikyMPEG4Face This class constructs a male MPEG-4 two-dimensional face for a MetaFace application.
